basics.name: Riadh Fezzani
basics.label: Doctor in applied mathematics
basics.summary:
Autonomous and curious, 8 years of experience including a Ph.D., I
                    appreciate multidisciplinary environments and the
                    implementation of efficient algorithms.

work.summary:
I actually work in the R&D departement of **Océ - A Canon compagny**,
                        within the **Eiger project** (large format **2.5D** and **3D**
                        high resolution printing). My work consists
                        in developping multiple tools for the
                        visualization and the manipulation of digital
                        3D objects. During this mission, I
                        participated to the filling of three patents.

Within the <abbr title="Systèmes d'Imagerie et Physique des
                        Images">SPIM</abbr> team in the _laboratoire
                        Charles Fabry_, I worked in the context of the
                        **Reveal** project in close collaboration with
                        the **iMove** team at **ONERA**, the
                        **Institut de la Vision** and **Imagine Eyes**
                        on the design of efficient algorithms for the
                        processing of eye fundus images aquired with
                        an adaptive optics camera

work.summary:
Within the **PARALL** team in the <abbr title="Laboratoire de
                        recherche en informatique">LRI</abbr>, I
                        worked in the context of the **PetalH**
                        project on the design of new parallel
                        preconditioners made for the acceleration of
                        the resolution of large ill-conditioned sparse
                        linear systems
highlights: approximate block LDU factorization with filtering constraints
